descriptions: p:Is your life like walking on eggshells?  Are you never sure when and why your child might get upset? Do they go from 0-100 in the blink of an eye?
p:Some children are highly sensitive to emotions and pressure, and parenting them takes a whole new skillset.

p:In this instalment of their popular webinar series, The Art of Low Demand Parenting, Dr Naomi Fisher (Changing Our Minds) and Eliza Fricker (Can't Not Won't, The Family Experience of PDA) bring their trademark informal and down to earth style to emotions - the low demand way.
p:They'll explain why many mainstream parenting approaches can make things worse and how to parent to help your child learn to manage their emotions.
p:This recording is available to watch for 12 months after purchase.
p:It is suitable for children with and without a diagnosis
p:Dr Naomi Fisher is a clinical psychologist and author. She specialises in trauma, autism and alternative approaches to education. She is registered with the HCPC.

p:Eliza Fricker is the author and illustrator of The Family Experience of PDA and Can't Not Won't. She runs a successful illustrated blog at www.missingthemark.blog and can be found on FB under the same name.
p: This recording is not therapy and should not be used as a replacement for therapy.
testimonials: I just wanted to express my happiness in this email. I attended your webinar on communication last night. I cried through most of it as I felt seen, not alone and like I have a direction to go in.
For the first time in over a year I feel hopeful.
It’s such a breath of fresh air to feel understood!!
